channel.title: Dedication
channel.description:
I am not sure if this is in the right place if not please notify me.
Ok well I have decided to get my server dedicated but I do not know where to buy the program or how to use it.
If anyone knows an answer to either of these with a link or something let me know.
By the way just so everyone knows (like the rules say) I have looked for one and have found a couple but when i click on by it asks for a wesite :(
Not sure how to make it run the server.
~Dr Pepper~Owner of Drpepperscape.no-ip.org~

item.title: Dedication
item.dc:creator: @DrPepper DrPepper
item.description:
@DrPepper wrote:

Well first off chris lol…No its not just buying a new computer. It is buying a program or something to run the server for you 24/7 and if you don’t have a computer with big enough memory you might want dedication.

Read full topic

item.title: Dedication
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

Ehm, no advertising in the help section… Also getting a server dedicated can cost serious amounts of cash per month, if your willing to pay that then go for it by why would you want to get a source dedicated when you can just leave an auto restarter on per hour and have your server 24\7?

Read full topic

item.title: Dedication
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

what the hell are talking about? dedicating a server is buying a new computer to host it on and nothing else is on that computer.

Read full topic
